org.joone.engine.learning
Class ComparisonSynapse

java.lang.Object
  org.joone.engine.Synapse
      org.joone.engine.learning.ComparisonSynapse
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.util.EventListener, InputPatternListener, org.joone.inspection.Inspectable, Learnable, NeuralElement, NeuralNetListener, OutputPatternListener, java.io.Serializable
public class ComparisonSynapse
extends Synapse
implements NeuralNetListener

Final element of a neural network; it permits to compare the outcome of the neural net and the input patterns from a StreamInputSynapse connected to the 'desired' property. Used by the ComparingSynapse object.

See Also:
Serialized Form
